titles.title: Supporting the designation of the week of September 8 through September 12, 2025, as "Malnutrition Awareness Week".
Supporting the designation of the week of September 8 through September 12, 2025, as "Malnutrition Awareness Week".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Agriculture, Ways and Means, and Education and Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
